geometry::impl::graticule

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class geometry::impl::graticule< T >

internal base class for latitude and longitude classes

The latitude longitude classes define different types for lat and lon. This is convenient to construct latlong class without ambiguity.

Note:
It is called graticule, after "This latitude/longitude "webbing" is known as the common graticule" (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geographic_coordinate_system)
Template parameters:
  • S latitude/longitude
  • T coordinate type, double float or int, should correspond to point_ll type
